channel.title: Seriously someone needs to fucking help me these forums are a bunch of shit
channel.description:
all i get is the same shit over and over again someone just fucking help me run the dam server so i can play on it...
ok so i have a pimpscape source jdk6u5, windows vista, and im on a laptop.......if u can help with the server tell me....
my compile code is...
Code: @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit and the run code is...
Code: @echo offtitle Runserverset java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe"java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause and my CLASSPATH is..
Code: CLASSPATH=C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%; and the path code i am using is...
Code: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin anyone who can help me please do i have been trying for 4 weeks to make a server .... AND if it is impossible to make ur own server on a laptop please tell me.........

item.title: Seriously someone needs to fucking help me these forums are a bunch of shit
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

[quote=“For ( ; ; ), post:17, topic:190311”][quote author=Ncarug01 link=topic=253760.msg2116563#msg2116563 date=1205803428]
zach gtfo if you don’t like the forums most people are busy in this community because there are alot of support help thingy’s 5 posts per second coming into the development forum the community doesn’t revolve around you because you always need help for some of the time your going to have to do shit on your own and thats one part of how you as in you learn java programming
so get out suck my balls and go jack off to a old lady
[/quote]

How about you go read a java tutorial instead moron.

Also zach you don’t state your problem in your post up there … how can you expect help.[/quote]

i do read them and if i cant find one that specifies my needs then i ask for help i dont scream THESE FORUMS ARE SO FUCKING STUPID OMFG IM DYING HERE IM CRYING LIKE A FUCKING BABY BECAUSE MY COMPILERS MESSED UP

also i tried pimpscape myself it didnt work for me so just a little suggest dont use pimpscape i recomend for a base server P16 thats how i started my server meh its going well so far in addition the compiler didnt work for me

this is the compiler i use its a simple compiler all it does is just compile none of that fancy stuff

[code]@echo off
title YOUR TITLE HERE

javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -classpath . *.java -g

pause[/code]

Read full topic

I’m sure you will get far more help by asking it nicely.

item.title: Seriously someone needs to fucking help me these forums are a bunch of shit
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Put it into a notepad document, (goto start>run>notepad) copy then paste it into the text area. Make sure you change the version, Click File>Save As> compile.bat and then find where you saved your server files, but it with all of those. Then click ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Seriously someone needs to fucking help me these forums are a bunch of shit
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Don’t listen to panther, he is a little kid with nothing to do. In my opinion, he should be playing in traffic right now. I don’t like the kid. I don’t think anyone does. If I had the chance to hit the kill button on someone, it would be him. here you go, make sure you change the !PUT YOUR VERSION HERE! to the version link. You can find it by going to C:\Program Files\Java
here you go:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title DePredaTe’s Compile/Run server.
echo Please wait as your server is being compiled
“C:\Program Files\Java!PUT YOUR VERSION HERE!\bin\javac.exe” *.java
echo Starting server!
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
tskill java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Seriously someone needs to fucking help me these forums are a bunch of shit
item.dc:creator: @zachisbomb zachisbomb
item.description:
@zachisbomb wrote:

all i get is the same shit over and over again someone just fucking help me run the dam server so i can play on it…

ok so i have a pimpscape source jdk6u5, windows vista, and im on a laptop…if u can help with the server tell me…

my compile code is…

Code:
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
and the run code is…

Code:
@echo offtitle Runserverset java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe"java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
and my CLASSPATH is…

Code:
CLASSPATH=C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and the path code i am using is…

Code:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
anyone who can help me please do i have been trying for 4 weeks to make a server … AND if it is impossible to make ur own server on a laptop please tell me…

Read full topic
